channel.title: admin on Yen-Chi Cheng
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Yen-Chi Cheng

item.description: I am a research assistant at National Tsing Hua University supervised by Prof. Min Sun. After taking CS61A, CS70 at UC Berkeley; Machine Learning (MLFound. and MLTech.) by Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin at NTU; several online courses (deeplearning.ai, cs231n, etc.) and the research experience during my time at NTHU and intern , I decided to pursue Ph.D./M.S in computer science to consolidate my research career. Previously, I was pleasure to have the opportunity to work with Prof.
